name: Let's Go Home (NaNoRenO 2023)
description:
This is my entry to NaNoRenO '23.  This is a visual novel about meeting some ghosts.  In the gamejam version, you can't really perform the title yet, but I'm out of time so I'm uploading what I have! In the gamejam state:
  • 17+k words
  • 4 grave puzzles to complete 
  • 4 ghosts to talk to
  • varying text in endings
Coming soon:
  • the 5th ghost
  • taking them home
  • more music and art
Music, art, design, and code by beepsalt. Character designs and character art by Artiac Cryon (https://twitter.com/ArtiacCryon).

additional credits for 1.0:

font is monogram

character audio bleeps: https://dmochas-assets.itch.io/dmochas-bleeps-pack
